content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM's culture is increasingly diverse. As a global team we come from over 25 countries across 4 continents but we share a common culture and interests as well as a passion for results.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Individually, we are shaped by our history and our local experience, but collectively we are a global team.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"VALUE PROPOSITION: WHY EPAM?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(26, 156, 176)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We believe that technology defines business success, and we relentlessly pursue the best solution for every client to solve where others fail.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/21f4ed9a-ac87-4ec4-97d8-bb9ce351482a/PROPOSITION%201.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":802,\"height\":327}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"OUR VALUES: WHAT MATTERS MOST TO EPAM?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(26, 156, 176)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We believe in five core values and their corresponding actions, which determine the way we work from day to day. It all starts with our values â€“ without them, our future successes would be unthinkable.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":43854,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/febe896f-3d72-4431-a616-84de3b9b6a5e/values.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/febe896f-3d72-4431-a616-84de3b9b6a5e/values.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"values.PNG\",\"name\":\"values.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"febe896f-3d72-4431-a616-84de3b9b6a5e\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":888,\"height\":665},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
